events.title: Kyotophonie Borderless Music Festival Autumn 2025
events.description: A one-of-a-kind music and food festival with one of Japan's most scenic views. This event promises a day filled with immersive sound experiences.

events.title: Jidai Matsuri
events.description: Celebrated on October 22, this festival features a parade in historical costumes, representing various eras in Japanese history.

events.title: Kurama Fire Festival
events.description: Taking place in the mountainous Kurama area, this thrilling fire festival includes traditional dances and the lighting of torches.

events.title: YAMATO – The Drummers of Japan Concert
events.description: A vibrant concert showcasing the traditional drumming of Japan, taking place as part of the fall activities in Kyoto.
